name: Booted in Space
description:
Survive as long as you can in this space boot action what the heck is this game.

Place figures on the timeline to control your two engines and the cannon. Shoot the enemies, collect stuff, avoid enemy bullets, you know the deal.

Made solo for Interstellar Game Jam 2.

Tools Used
  • Godot - the game engine
  • Inkscape - a vector graphics editor
  • SunVox - a music tracker/synthesizer
  • LabChirp - an SFX generator
  • Palette: SLSO-CLR17
  • Font: Comfortaa
